mapper.select: /* AuthGroupMapper.selectGroup */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 1 ORDER BY 1) NO, GRP_CD, GRP_NM, TARGET_ALL_FG, (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '903' AND NMCODE_CD = A.TARGET_ALL_FG) TARGET_ALL_FG_NM, TARGET_ORGN, ( SELECT MAX(TARGET_ORGN_NM) FROM ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_NM TARGET_ORGN_NM FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.TARGET_ORGN UNION ALL SELECT AGENCY_NM TARGET_ORGN_NM FROM TB_CM_AGENCY WHERE AGENCY_CD = A.TARGET_ORGN ) ) TARGET_ORGN_NM, REMARK, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID FROM TB_WB_AUTHOR_GRP_INFO A
mapper.insert: /* AuthGroupMapper.insertGroup */ INSERT INTO TB_WB_AUTHOR_GRP_INFO ( GRP_CD GRP_NM TARGET_ALL_FG TARGET_ORGN REMARK, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{grpCd}, #{grpNm}, #{targetAllFg}, #{targetOrgn}, #{remark}, #{useYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
